creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
by Yamato Watamori: 
(Seeing off Gakute's departure,
Sun rising in the eastern sky
?????
What kind of sky
Is wating for you 
In your travel)
{Gakutei uji no tabidachi wo okurite'
Higashi yori
???? tomou
?? no tsuru
Hinode no kimi wo
Matsu tabi no sora}
medium: Woodblock print (surimono), ink and color on paper
title: (Flying Crane, Rising Sun)
